Basic meanings of word: (transitive) to see/catch sight of, (reflexive) to realise/to become aware of
to make sure, to take care of
to base (have as a foundation or start)
to content/ satisfy, (reflexive) to be content (with + de)
to agree (+ de), to be convenient for (+ à)
to put to sleep, (reflexive) to fall asleep
to raise, (reflexive) to improve a rank
to place something in a location, (reflexive) to place in a competition
